item.title: JVM dump lab
item.description: IBM dump files [pdf-embedder url=”/media/WSTE-02092010-DeepDiveJVMJavacoresJavaDumps-Grigorenko.pdf”] What is java core (or javadump or thread dump)? A java core is a snapshot of the threads at work in a JVM. It also details a cross section of information from the major components in the JVM like XM,XE, LK, etc (IBM Javacore only, Sun does not â€“ it just shows threads) A Java dump, also known as a Java core, Java thread dump, or a thread dump is a file that contains the following sections:
